room_title: Escape room "Mad Hatter" by Escape Countdown in Sarasota
review: We did the Mad Hatter room. So much fun. This was our first escape experience and there was 7 of us and we all are hooked. The staff was super nice.

room_title: Escape room "Mad Hatter" by Escape Countdown in Sarasota
review: Our party of 8 had a fabulous time at the "tea party" escape. Love this place, lots of fun! Try it.

room_title: Escape room "Mad Hatter" by Escape Countdown in Sarasota
review: My niece had told me about this place and my boyfriend and I decided to take her for her birthday. We did the Mad Hatter room because we are Alice in Wonderland fans. It was nothing short of awesome. They stuck to the riddle theme and made things not too hard, but definitely not easy. We successfully escaped the room! It was that something different that Sarasota needed to keep us all occupied, but still using our brains! We look forward to coming back and doing the Jail Break, as well as any additional rooms they open in the future!

room_title: Escape room "Mad Hatter" by Escape Countdown in Sarasota
review: My wife booked the Mad Hatter for my birthday on 3/13. It was the first time we had ever done something like this but what an experience. We may not have finished in time because it was our first time. It definitely will not be our last time. I was hooked after the first 5 minutes or so. I have been telling everyone I know about this place and how they should try it. It was absolutely the best Birthday present ever.

room_title: Escape room "Mad Hatter" by Escape Countdown in Sarasota
review: Had a blast! We did the Mad Hatter room last night, for my daughter's 14th Birthday, and it was perfect! The staff was great and the whole experience was definitely one to remember. It was our first time and we went in a bit worried because the Jail Break group before us didn't make it out BUT, we escaped with just over 5 minutes to spare. And honestly, even if we hadn't made it out in time, it wouldn't have mattered because it was that fun. We'll be back!
